body:
// If types[0] has a type, then it is not defined, and the type will get set to types[0] because that will be the value propagated. If its type is _not_ defined, then unification is an undefined type.

I will add a comment. I believe this does not get reached by our actual pathways, but I put it here to keep it from faulting if we re-arrange how these are used.
